scripts.build: pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client
scripts.clean: cd client && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf dist node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.lint: cd client && pnpm lint && cd ../server && pnpm lint
scripts.type-check: cd client && pnpm type-check && cd ../server && pnpm type-check
scripts.setup: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.dev:fresh: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
